main event: Two to four unidentified flying objects were observed in Beaumont, Texas on September 6, 1954 for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were observed by both civilian and military witnesses.
The objects were observed to change course from 325 to 135 degrees.
The report notes that there was insufficient data for a full evaluation of the sighting.
The report mentions a possible 3/6 observation, which may refer to a radar observation.
The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes.
sighted object: two to four unidentified flying objects
